TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ExpandableObjectConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供在可扩展对象与其他各种表示形式之间实现转换的类型转换器。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert expandable objects to and from various other representations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类将对属性的支持的对象添加到的方法和属性提供的。This class adds support for properties on an object to the methods and properties provided by . 若要使属性类型中可展开，指定此的标准实现和。To make a type of property expandable in the , specify this for standard implementations of and . 将标记与子属性确保在中的正确行为控件。Mark child properties with the to ensure correct behavior in a control. > [!NOTE] > 永远不应直接访问的类型转换器。You should never access a type converter directly. 相反，通过调用适当的转换器。Instead, call the appropriate converter by using . 有关详细信息，请参阅中的示例基类。For more information, see the examples in the base class. 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅基类和[如何： 实现类型转换器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将转换类型的变量的到字符串变量。The following code example converts a variable of type to a string variable. [!code-cpp[Converters#26](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/CPP/converters.cpp#26)] [!code-csharp[Converters#26](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/CS/converters.cs#26)] [!code-vb[Converters#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/VB/converters.vb#26)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用和类来创建自定义控件的可展开的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and the class to create an expandable property on a custom control. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.ExpandableObjectConverter#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.ExpandableObjectConverter/CS/DemoControl.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.ExpandableObjectConverter#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.ExpandableObjectConverter/VB/DemoControl.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection GetProperties (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, object value, Attribute[] attributes);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection GetProperties(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, object value, class System.Attribute[] attributes) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetProperties (context As ITypeDescriptorContext, value As Object, attributes As Attribute()) As PropertyDescriptorCollection

public: override System::ComponentModel::PropertyDescriptorCollection ^ GetProperties(System::ComponentModel::ITypeDescriptorContext ^ context, System::Object ^ value, cli::array <Attribute ^> ^ attributes);

param.name: context
param.span: 一个 ，用于提供格式上下文。

span.span: An that provides a format context.

param.name: value
param.span: 一个 ，它指定要获取其属性的对象类型。

span.span: An that specifies the type of object to get the properties for.

param.name: attributes
param.span: 一个将用作筛选器的 类型的数组。

span.span: An array of type that will be used as a filter.

summary.span: 获取由值参数指定的对象类型的属性集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of properties for the type of object specified by the value parameter.

returns.span: 具有为此组件公开的属性的 ；或者如果没有属性，则为 。

span.span: A with the properties that are exposed for the component, or if there are no properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `context` 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 此参数可能为 `null`，因此总是需要检查。This can be `null`, so always check. 同样，上下文对象的属性可以返回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`. `attributes`数组将用于筛选数组。The `attributes` array will be used to filter the array. `attributes`可以具有多种和对象。The `attributes` can have a mix of and objects. 筛选由以下规则定义：Filtering is defined by the following rules: - A对象将被视为通配符; 它将与匹配的任何属性都具有属性其集中。A object will be treated as a wildcard; it will match any property that has the in its set of attributes. - 如果属性不具有的同一个类，将不属性包括在返回的数组。If a property does not have an of the same class, the property will not be included in the returned array. - 如果属性是实例，该属性必须是完全匹配，或它不包括在返回的数组。If the attribute is an instance of , the property must be an exact match or it will not be included in the returned array. - 如果指定实例和它是默认属性，它将包括在返回的数组即使不没有的任何实例属性中。If a instance is specified and it is the default property, it will be included in the returned array even if there is no instance of the in the property.

returns.span: 由于应调用 来查找此对象的属性，因此为 。

span.span: because should be called to find the properties of this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `context` 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 此参数可能为 `null`，因此总是需要检查。This can be `null`, so always check. 同样，上下文对象的属性可以返回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
